perk.perks.economy.description.1: Reduces Perk usage costs by 10 percent.
perk.perks.economy.description.2: Reduces Perk usage costs by 15 percent.
perk.perks.economy.description.3: Reduces Perk usage costs by 20 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.1: Reduces Perk learning costs by 5 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.2: Reduces Perk learning costs by 10 percent.
perk.perks.intelligence.description.3: Reduces Perk learning costs by 15 percent.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.1: Your fist breaks the block like a shovel.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.2: Your fist breaks the block like a axe.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.3: Your fist breaks the block like a sword.
perk.perks.iron_fist.description.4: Your fist breaks the block like a pickaxe.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.1: When you cultivate land in Hoe, it will automatically plow a 3x3 area around it.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.2: When you cultivate land in Hoe, it will automatically plow a 5x5 area around it.
perk.perks.cultivator.description.3: When you cultivate land in Hoe, it will automatically plow a 7x7 area around it.
perk.perks.seeder.description.1: When a seed or crop is planted, it automatically plants within a 3x3 area around it.
perk.perks.seeder.description.2: When a seed or crop is planted, it automatically plants within a 5x5 area around it.
perk.perks.seeder.description.3: When a seed or crop is planted, it automatically plants within a 7x7 area around it.
perk.perks.spreader.description.1: When you use bone meal, it will automatically use a 3x3 area around it.
perk.perks.spreader.description.2: When you use bone meal, it will automatically use a 5x5 area around it.
perk.perks.spreader.description.3: When you use bone meal, it will automatically use a 7x7 area around it.
perk.perks.harvester.description.1: When the crop is harvested, it automatically harvests the crop within a 3x3 area around it.
perk.perks.harvester.description.2: When the crop is harvested, it automatically harvests the crop within a 5x5 area around it.
perk.perks.harvester.description.3: When the crop is harvested, it automatically harvests the crop within a 7x7 area around it.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.1: You can double the refining speed of the nearby furnace.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.2: You can tripled the refining speed of the nearby furnace.
perk.perks.furnaceman.description.3: You can quadrupled the refining speed of the nearby furnace.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.1: Disable teleport when eating chorus fruit.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.2: Disable endermite spawning when using ender pearl.
perk.perks.resident_of_end.description.3: Disable damage when using ender pearl.
perk.perks.breeder.description.1: When you feed an adult animal, it automatically feeds any adult animal within a 3x3 perimeter.
perk.perks.breeder.description.2: When you feed an adult animal, it automatically feeds any adult animal within a 5x5 perimeter.
perk.perks.breeder.description.3: When you feed an adult animal, it automatically feeds any adult animal within a 7x7 perimeter.
perk.perks.feeder.description.1: When you feed a child's animal, it automatically feeds the child's animal within a 3x3 perimeter.
perk.perks.feeder.description.2: When you feed a child's animal, it automatically feeds the child's animal within a 5x5 perimeter.
perk.perks.feeder.description.3: When you feed a child's animal, it automatically feeds the child's animal within a 7x7 perimeter.
You can destroy obsidian twice as fast.
You can destroy obsidian three times faster.
You can destroy obsidian four times faster.
perk.perks.polisher.description.1: When polished equipment with Grindstone, the finished product will retain its enchantment.
gui.perks.perks.title: Perks
gui.perks.perks.tooltip.perk_progress: You have {0} percent left until it unlocks
commands.perks.set_experience.query: Perk experience for {0} has been set to {1, number}.
